main.name: Naman Singh
main.description: I am a full stack development engineer.
main.bio: Hello, I am experience Software Engineer who constantly seeks out innovation solutions to everyday problems. In my 2 years in this industry. i've honed my analytical thinking and collaboration skill. and I love working witha team. i have also had the opportunity to serve as the Software Engineer lead for two project with fast technology.
